Welcome to the group Richard. I hope that you will share some of your experiences with us. Your page is interesting. I believe you already know some of the members here but feel free to post some stuff for the rest of us who may have missed out.
   
  Franks fine with the paranormal its all the nuts he has a problem with. 
   
  Misty

LON3_S7AR <lon3_s7ar@...> wrote:
            frank
  i know that the "paranormal" thing, puts you off? dont know if im saying that right lol
  but alot of your business woulds come from this feild, not to mention that ALOT of these4 people also do evp like many of us, not just ghost hunting. Remember ghost hunting is wehat sparked my interest in evp lol
  just a thought
  amy
